programName: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

heroSection.heading: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
heroSection.subheading: Choose BSIT as ur course lol it's fun trust me :)

aboutSection.heading: This is where imma put the about section heading
aboutSection.subheading: This is an about section subheading where you tell your site visitors something about your college. Maybe vision or mission it's up to you.

careerSection.title: Software Developer
careerSection.description: Design, build, and maintain applications for web, mobile, or desktop platforms using modern programming languages and frameworks.

careerSection.title: Web Developer
careerSection.description: Create and maintain websites and web applications, focusing on front-end user experience or back-end server logic.

careerSection.title: Database Administrator
careerSection.description: Manage and secure databases, ensuring data integrity, performance, and availability for organizations.

careerSection.title: Systems Analyst
careerSection.description: Analyze business requirements and design technology solutions that improve efficiency and meet organizational needs.

careerSection.title: Network Administrator
careerSection.description: Configure, manage, and troubleshoot computer networks of organizations to ensure reliable communication and security.

careerSection.title: IT Support Specialist
careerSection.description: Provide technical assistance, troubleshoot hardware and software issues, and support end-users within organizations.

careerSection.title: Cybersecurity Specialist
careerSection.description: Protect systems and data from security breaches by implementing defenses, monitoring threats, and enforcing security policies.

careerSection.title: Mobile Application Developer
careerSection.description: Design and develop mobile apps for iOS and Android platforms, focusing on performance, usability, and user experience.

careerSection.title: Game Developer
careerSection.description: Build interactive video games by combining programming, graphics, and game design principles.

careerSection.title: IT Project Manager
careerSection.description: Oversee technology projects, manage teams, allocate resources, and ensure projects are delivered on time and within budget.
